Verses: 1 yesu Thammudaiya Pannirandu Seeshargalukkum Kattalaikoduththu Mudiththapinbu, Avargalutaiya Pattanangalil Ubadhesikkavum Pirasangikkavum Avvidam Vittup Ponaar.
2 aththarunaththil Kaavalilirundha Yovaan Kiristhuvin Kiriyaikalaikkuriththuk Kelvippattu, Than Seesharil Irandu Perai Azhaiththu:
3 varugiravar Neerdhaanaa? Alladhu Veroruvar Varakkaaththirukkavendumaa? Endru Avaridaththil Ketkumpadi Anuppinaan.
4 yesu Avargalukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Neengal Ketkiradhaiyum Kaankiradhaiyum Yovaanidaththil Poi Ariviyungal;

5 kurudar Paarvaiyadaigiraargal, Sappaanigal Nadakkiraargal, Kushtarokigal Suththamaagiraargal, Sevidar Ketkiraargal, Mariththor Ezhundhirukkiraargal; Thariththirarukku Suvisesham Pirasangikkappadugiradhu.
6 ennidaththil Idaraladaiyaadhirukkiravan Evano Avan Paakkiyavaan Endraar.
7 avargal Ponapinbu, Yesu Yovaanaikkuriththu Janangalukku Sonnadhu Ennavendraal: Edhaip Paarkka Vanaandharaththirkup Poneergal? Kaatrinaal Asaiyum Naanalaiyo?
8 allavendraal, Edhaip Paarkkapponeergal? Melliya Vasthiranthariththa Manushanaiyo? Melliya Vasthiranthariththirukkiravargal Arasar Maaligaigalil Irukkiraargal.
9 allavendraal, Edhaip Paarkkapponeergal? Theerkkadharisiyaiyo? Aam, Theerkkaththarisiyaippaarkkilum Menmaiyullavanaiye Endru Ungalukku Sollugiren.
10 adheppadiyenil, Idho, Naan En Thoodhanai Umakku Munbaaga Anuppugiren; Avan Umakku Munne Poi Vazhiyai Aayaththam Pannuvaan Endru Ezhudhiya Vaakkiyaththaal Kurikkappattavan Ivandhaan.

11 sthireegalidaththile Pirandhavargalil Yovaansnaananaip Paarkkilum Periyavan Oruvanum Ezhumpinadhillai; Aagilum, Paralogaraajyaththil Siriyavanaayirukkiravan Avanilum Periyavanaayirukkiraanendru Ungalukku Meyyaagave Sollugiren.
12 yovaansnaanan Kaalamudhal Idhuvaraikkum Paralogaraajyam Balavandham Pannappadukiradhu; Palavandham Pannugiravargal Adhaip Pidiththukkollugiraargal.
13 niyaayappiramaanamum Theerkkadharisigal Yaavarum Yovaanvaraikkum Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththadhundu.
14 neengal Etrukkolla Manadhaayirundhaal, Varugiravanaagiya Eliyaa Ivanthaan.
15 ketkiradharku Kaadhullavan Ketkakkadavan.
16 indha Sandhadhiyai Yaarukku Oppiduven? Sandhaiveligalil Utkaarndhu, Thangal Thozharaippaarththu:
17 ungalukkaaga Kuzhal Oodhinom, Neengal Kooththaadavillai; Ungalukkaakap Pulambinom, Neengal Maaradikkavillai Endru Kuraisollugira Pillaigalukku Oppaayirukkiradhu.
18 eppadiyenil, Yovaan Pojanapaanampannaadhavanaai Vandhaan; Adharku Avargal: Avan Pisaasu Pitiththirukkiravan Endraargal.

19 manushakumaaran Pojanampannugiravaraai Vandhaar; Adharku Avargal: Idho, Pojanappiriyanum Madhupaanappiriyanumaana Manushan, Aayakkaararukkum Paavigalukkum Sinegidhan Engiraargal. Aanaalum Gnaanamaanadhu Adhan Pillaigalaal Needhiyulladhendru Oppukkollappadum Endraar.
20 appozhudhu Thamadhu Balaththa Seygaigalil Adhigamaanavaigalai Seyyak Kanda Pattanangal, Manandhirumpaamar Ponapadiyinaal, Avaigalai Avar Kadindhu Kollaththodanginaar.

21 koraasine! Unakku Aiyo, Pedhsaayidhaave! Unakku Aiyo, Ungalil Seyyappatta Balaththa Seykaigal Theeruvilum Seedhonilum Seyyappattirundhadhaanaal, Appozhudhe Irattuduththi Saampalil Utkaarndhu Manandhirumpiyiruppaargal.
22 niyaayaththeerppu Naalile Ungalukku Neriduvadhaippaarkkilum Theeruvukkum Seedhonukkum Neriduvadhu Lakuvaayirukkumendru Ungalukku Sollugiren.

23  Vaanapariyandham Uyarththappatta Kapparnakoome, Nee Paadhaalapariyandham Thaazhththappaduvaai; Unnil Seyyappatta Balaththa Seygaigal Sodhomile Seyyappattirundhadhaanaal, Adhu Innaal Varaikkum Nilaiththirukkum.
24  Niyaayaththeerppu Naalile Unakku Neriduvadhaippaarkkilum Sodhom Naattirku Neriduvadhu Lakuvaayirukkumendru Ungalukku Sollugiren.

25 andha Samayaththil Yesu Sonnadhu: Pidhaave! Vaanaththukkum Boomikkum Aandavare! Ivaigalai Gnaanigalukkum Kalvimaangalukkum Maraiththu, Paalagarukku Velippaduththinapadiyaal Ummai Sthoththirikkiren.
26 aam Pidhaave! Ippadi Seyvadhu Ummudaiya Thiruvulaththukkup Piriyamaayirundhadhu.

27 sagalamum En Pidhaavinaal Enakku Oppukkodukkappattirukkiradhu. Pidhaa Thavira Veroruvanum Kumaaranai Ariyaan; Kumaaranum, Kumaaran Evanukku Avarai Velippaduththa Siththamaayirukkiraaro Avanum Thavira, Veroruvanum Pidhaavai Ariyaan.
28 varuththappattup Paaranjumakkiravargale! Neengal Ellaarum Ennidaththil Vaarungal; Naan Ungalukku Ilaippaarudhal Tharuven.
29 naan Saandhamum Manaththaazhmaiyumaayirukkiren; En Nugaththai Ungalmel Etrukkondu, Ennidaththil Katrukkollungal. Appozhudhu, Ungal Aaththumaakkalukku Ilaippaarudhal Kidaikkum.
30 en Nugam Medhuvaayum En Sumai Ilaguvaayum Irukkiradhu Endraar.
